description: I worked in this company as a Web Developer, creating dynamic web apps with HTML - CSS - JS. I also controlled the bugfixing to mantain the apps working. The company also worked as a CRM, and I was in charge to do other kind of tasks. On of the most important roles was the communication with the clients. I communicated directly with them to understand better what was happening. If there was any problem or they wanted to make any change, I received the instructions directly.
